headline.print_headline: Climate Research That Might Not Help
headline.main: Climate Research That Might Not Help

docs.lead_paragraph: A reasonable response to finding a correlation between obesity and climate change might be: so what?
docs.snippet: A reasonable response to finding a correlation between obesity and climate change might be: so what?

docs.lead_paragraph: The place to start fighting the childhood obesity epidemic is the schools where junk foods are sold outside the healthy federal meals programs.
docs.snippet: The place to start fighting the childhood obesity epidemic is the schools where junk foods are sold outside the healthy federal meals programs.

docs.lead_paragraph: 8 P.M. (CBS) STREISAND: LIVE IN CONCERTBarbra Streisand, right, sings ''The Way We Were,'' ''Somewhere,'' ''Evergreen,'' ''Don't Rain on My Parade'' and other hits in this program, which was filmed at her sold-out concert in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., in 2006, at which she was joined by Il Divo. The show celebrates the release of ''Streisand the Concerts,'' a three-disc DVD set, on Tuesday. Ms. Streisand can also be seen in her Oscar-winning role as the comedian Fanny Brice in ''Funny Girl'' (1968) on TCM at 8 p.m. NOON (13) THE OPEN MIND The sociologist Michael Schudson talks about his book of essays on journalism and democracy.

headline.print_headline: Fructose-Sweetened Beverages Linked to Heart Risks in Overweight Patients
headline.main: Fructose-Sweetened Beverages Linked to Heart Risks

docs.lead_paragraph: Overweight people who consumed drinks sweetened with fructose, rather than glucose, had higher blood levels of L.D.L. and triglycerides, researchers said.
docs.snippet: Overweight people who consumed drinks sweetened with fructose, rather than glucose, had higher blood levels of L.D.L. and triglycerides, researchers said.
